Package core.modAPI

Interface CreatureAction

  • public interface CreatureAction
    An action associated with a set of outputs. Implement this interface if you want your creatures to interact with the environment (tiles or other creatures) in new ways.
    Author:
    clay

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void doAction​(Brain brain, Creature creature, Board board, double timeStep)
      This method is called after the creature's brain's think() method is called.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRequiredOutputs()  
      java.lang.String getUserInstructions()
      This method is used to tell the user what key to press to do this action while controlling a creature
      void userDoAction​(char keyPressed, Creature creature, Board board, double timeStep)
      This method is called when the user is controlling the creature and tries to do this action

    • Method Detail

      • getRequiredOutputs

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRequiredOutputs()
        Returns:
        a list of strings representing the outputs this action uses

      • doAction

        void doAction​(Brain brain,
              Creature creature,
              Board board,
              double timeStep)
        This method is called after the creature's brain's think() method is called. In this method Unless you want the creatures to constantly be performing this action, it is reccomended you check the brain's output values to make sure that the creature is trying to perform this action. This action doesn't neccessarily have to trigger.
        Parameters:
        brain - the brain of the creature that may or may not perform this action
        creature - the creature mentioned above
        board - the board that creature lives on
        timeStep - I really don't know what this does. I included it because some Evolvio Original mods needed it for some reason

      • userDoAction

        void userDoAction​(char keyPressed,
                  Creature creature,
                  Board board,
                  double timeStep)
        This method is called when the user is controlling the creature and tries to do this action
        Parameters:
        creature - the creature doing the action
        board - the board that creature lives on
        timeStep - I really don't know what this does. I included it because some Evolvio Original mods needed it for some reason

      • getUserInstructions

        java.lang.String getUserInstructions()
        This method is used to tell the user what key to press to do this action while controlling a creature
        Returns:
        the keys that the user needs to press to do this action along with the name of the action
